description:
The Nomad Dry Suit delivers superior waterproof, breathable protection without the bulk of a kayak overskirt. The zippered front entry and relief zip make it easy to get in and out of, and the neoprene wrist gaskets and latex ankle gaskets provide a comfortable, secure fit.

  • GORE-TEX Pro is quiet, comfortable, and durably waterproof and breathable
  • Contoured volcano-style neoprene neck gasket for comfort and protection
  • GlideSkin™ neoprene overcuffs protect latex wrist gaskets
  • Cordura® reinforced inner ankle for increased durability
  • Factory-sealed seams for waterproofness
  • Self-draining mesh holes under wrist and neck
  • Front entry Aquaseal™ zipper with relief opening
  • GORE-TEX Pro socks keep your feet dry and warm
name: NRS Nomad Dry Suit - Men's
